ViewObject.Name: InvoiceAgentEmailIdView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT email_otp.cust_contact_point_id cust_contact_point_id,email_otp.email_address||'('||con.first_name||' '||con.last_name||')' email_address FROM ar_contacts_v con, (SELECT phone_country_code country_code, phone_area_code area_code, phone_number, phone_extension extension, primary_flag, primary_by_purpose, status, orig_system_reference, contact_point_id phone_id, contact_point_id cust_contact_point_id, contact_point_type, owner_table_id, email_address, email_format, contact_point_purpose FROM hz_contact_points WHERE owner_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES' AND status = 'A' AND contact_point_type = 'EMAIL' AND contact_point_purpose = 'SICD_INVOICE_EMAIL' ORDER BY primary_flag DESC) email_otp WHERE 1 = 1 AND email_otp.owner_table_id = con.rel_party_id AND customer_id = :pCustomerId order by upper(email_address)
